The researcher, the Quran, the name of your Lord, that is, and the remembrance of his remembrance, night and night, on any face, from praise, recklessness, and praise, prayer, and the Qur’an, and the Qur’an, and the Qur’an, and the Qur’an, and the Qur’an, The prayers and peace be upon him, and he did not forget him until he is commanded by his remembrance of his grace and the perpetrator, the norm, not the truth, because it is not possible.Specialization was the meaning of what you heard from the day and night, and it was done to it, that is, and it was cut off to it with worship, and the soul was broken, and it is not the same.Glory be to him, as if this is a matter of what is related to the interior, after the matter, with what is related to the back and to confirm that, he said that he will give him a long time He was done on what was said, and the words were presented in the investigation of that when he said, and God has given you a plant from the earth.The matter is in the observance of the communication.
